Eevee's wireless fence dealy came. I walked around like an idiot for a while putting down boundary flags. I'm excited for her to be free*.
Is "See your friends up close with full screen photos" really one of the 2 best selling points of this? http://is.gd/4UgQO
Even when I am procrastinating working I am surfing the web looking at infographics... I guess that says something.
Well, it sure is nice to have a keyboard again. I can start making music again!
http://bit.ly/2pM0BV #infographic

"I love you more than prison forks love shanking thugs."
Tweeting for 3 years, 2 weeks, 5 days, 20 hours, 42 minutes, 47 seconds (October 25, 2006). How about you? http://bit.ly/eC942
Eevee stole a roll of my film. EEVEE YOU ARE STEALING MEMORIES WHAT THE EFF
Dani: "what the hell is that? ...oh. It's the wall."
In study hall. Started my egographic project today. Going moderately well so far.
Listening to Death Cab for Cutie "Wait" a lot this morning. It seems to... warm me up. =P
Took a shower, made some tea. God. Getting up in the morning is weird.
And... we're off!
Really truly going to sleep now.
Still awake going through XKCD archives. Realized that there's so much I can do in life, and that school shouldn't eat my happiness.
Correction; gonna re-do (or try to re-do) the keyboard track on Fastee.
It's time to pass out- weird night...
Oh man. It's raining. =\
Listening to "Kasper Hauser Comedy Podcast - Ep. 5: Spicy Pony Head" and then "Le Show" because I've heard this This American Life, and it's depressing.
Listening to This American Life.
Spray painting my Jolt and Altoids cans.
Reading about Emma goldman
Arguing about school.
Talking to friend on AIM and IRC.
Watching the movie "accepted".
Surfing the web and chatting on IRC...

fix(deploy.yml): add write permission for contents

docs: add README, github page deploy action
